english: She lent her name to many worthy causes .
chinese: 她参与了许多有意义的事情。

english: It is instructive to present both these views .
chinese: 先提到这两点是很有意义的。

english: Three types of auxiliary conditions are of interest .
chinese: 三种辅助条件是有意义的。

english: What is really significant is the body-to-beam angle .
chinese: 然而真正有意义的是弹体一波束角。

english: This approach would serve two valuable purposes .
chinese: 这样探讨问题可以达到两个有意义的目的。
有意义的造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: We are fully behind the fine work you are doing .
chinese: 我们全力支持你们所做的这种很有意义的工作。

english: Some unexpected and interesting partnerships turn up .
chinese: 出现了一些未曾料到的有意义的合伙关系。

english: I had rather undertake some purposeful labour than stay idle .
chinese: 我宁可做些有意义的劳动也不愿闲着。

english: Bridged bicyclooctanes gave no significant bridgehead substitution .
chinese: 桥二环辛烷不给出有意义的桥头取代。

english: Such an approach may give rise to a research field of interest .
chinese: 这种手段可能产生一个有意义的探索领域。

english: Only differences in enthalpy are of practical engineering interest .
chinese: 在实际工程上有意义的只是热含量之差。

english: Saturation of a biotope is of special interest to the ecologist .
chinese: 生境小区的饱和对生态学家是特别有意义的。

english: The american people proposed to honour him in a more meaningful way .
chinese: 美国人民曾建议来用一种更有意义的方法来纪念他。

english: It is interesting to inquire into the exact mechanism of this energy loss .
chinese: 确切地查明这一能量损失的作用过程还是有意义的。

english: The more significant synthetic dividend of this simple process is reaped .
chinese: 可以从这个简单反应中得到在合成上更有意义的收获。
